txt.en: A furious Erlys has demanded that you help her free Cariad.

'No one captures a member of the Cuan-l没th and lives to tell the tale. I'll tear apart Tornhad myself to release Cariad. You're coming with me -- Igrain, too. It's time to test you both and see where your alliances truly lie.'
Erlys would like to speak with you before you depart the Cuan-l没th Refuge.
'I hope you prove me wrong, duvodiad, and that you will show your strength.'

'You could have brought about the end of the Cuan-l没th, but you tried to help. I can see the value in that.\n\n'Whatever the Rangers decide to do doesn't matter. In time, we shall carve out a more permanent home here, with or without their help.'
Erlys has decided to free Cariad from Tornhad with your aid and Igrain's.\n\nYou should talk to her in the Cuan-l没th Refuge when you're ready.
